articles.description: Pradeep, who started his acting career in 2001 at the age of 40, mostly donned comedy roles. He had acted in over 70 movies.
articles.content:
Kottayam: Malayalam actor Pradeep KR, who is more popular by the name Kottayam Pradeep, died following a heart attack on Thursday. He was 61.
